item.title: Space filling curves and CNN
item.description: 👷🏻 this is a work in progress 🔧 Sometimes by exploring incongruous ideas, one can make interesting discoveries. This is know as serendipity in science, with penicillin being a famous example of an unplanned discovery. What I experimented with this week-end… is no such case. 😅 In the spirit of not holding back negative results though, and for the unlikely possibility that it turns out helpful for someone, I’ll share it regardless!
